factsheet.heading: Circular Free Play Workshop, hosted by Studio TIP
paragraphs: In this workshop, youâ€™ll work with Studio TIP to turn real-world surplus materials - the kind that normally gets overlooked after mass production - into playful objects and artworks. Offcuts, trims, odd shapes and leftovers. Stuff that didnâ€™t make the cut. Until now.

Guided by a Material Library, weâ€™ll teach the principles of reuse, remix, and circular design through hands-on play. Think less classroom, more scrapyard meets sketchbook. Youâ€™ll test, build, mess up, and make something weird and brilliant.
Celebrate reuse, creativity and exploration in this tactile and sensory environment.

factsheet.heading: What to expect
paragraphs:
This is not a structured class - it's a space for children to lead their own play, build, stack, sort and invent. Mess is welcome, no rules apply!
 
No experience needed. Just curiosity.
This workshop is for children from 1 year + (with parents) up to all ages.
